overview: Noriko Sakai brings the 30th anniversary version of "NORIKO BOX," the deluxe box set originally released in March 2002. This version contains seven CDs and three DVDs. This time, the CDs feature SHM-CD format, and the set comes with a deluxe booklet. The three DVDs contain complete music videos of songs, and live performances.
title: NORIKO BOX [30th Anniversary Mammoth Edition]
